bibdata.title: IEC/IEEE International Standard
VHDL Register Transfer Level (RTL) Synthesis
IEC/IEEE International Standard - VHDL Register Transfer Level (RTL) Synthesis

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Replaces IEEE Std 1076.6-2004. This document specifies a standard for use of very high-speed integrated circuit hardware description language (VHDL) to model synthesizable register-transfer level digital logic. A standard syntax and semantics for VHDL register-transfer level synthesis is defined. The subset of the VHDL language, which is synthesizable, is described, and nonsynthesizable VHDL constructs are identified that should be ignored or flagged as errors.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.keyword: very high speed integrated circuit hardware description language (VHDL)
